summary: An ordinance amending Sections 2, 3 and 5 of Ordinance No. 37815, entitled: "An ordinance relating to and specifying and adopting a plan or system of additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the existing municipal street railway system owned and operated by the City of Seattle, providing for the issuance and sale of bonds of said city to provide funds therefor, and for the creation of a special fund to pay the principal and interest of such bonds", approved October 29, 1917.
